description.narrative: This small research activity is conducting desktop research on the Philippines tropical fruit industries, and compiling areas for mutually beneficial collaborative research efforts. It will have an emphasis on production, postharvest and processing opportunities for durian and jackfruit in the Philippines. A minor part of the study tour will be to report on opportunities for crops such as calamansi, sugar apple (atis), mangosteen, rambutan, guava, lemonsito, water apple (tambis), carambola, cocoa, pomelo, lonzanes, soursop, sapodilla, dragon fruit, marang and santol. The new project proposal developed through this SRA will be part of an expanded horticulture program in the Philippines. (HORT/2012/104)
